name: Conditional order pronounced / granted (sole + joint) (SOLICITOR)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
((applicant1Label)): ((applicant1FullName))
((applicant2Label)): ((applicant2FullName))
Issue date: ((issueDate))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

The conditional order has been pronounced on this ((union type)) application. 

View and download the conditional order: ((signin url))

A final order can be applied from ((CO pronouncement date plus 43 days)). 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Conditional order pronounced: ((reference number))
